```{=html}
<iframe src="urbanform/index.html" class="urbanform-iframe" id="map-iframe"></iframe>
<script>
  // Dynamically position iframe directly below navbar
  function positionIframe() {
    const navbar = document.querySelector('nav.navbar, .navbar, header nav, #quarto-header');
    const iframe = document.getElementById('map-iframe');
    if (navbar && iframe) {
      const navbarHeight = navbar.getBoundingClientRect().height;
      iframe.style.top = navbarHeight + 'px';
      iframe.style.height = 'calc(100vh - ' + navbarHeight + 'px)';
      iframe.style.height = 'calc(100dvh - ' + navbarHeight + 'px)';
    }
  }

  // Run on load and resize
  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', positionIframe);
  window.addEventListener('resize', positionIframe);
  window.addEventListener('load', positionIframe);

  // Also run immediately in case DOM is already ready
  positionIframe();
</script>
```
